tool_description: Searches chemical fragment libraries for substructures and building blocks matching specified criteria.

query_structure.description: Query structure as SMILES or SMARTS pattern

search_type.description: Search type: exact, substructure, similarity, or pharmacophore

library_source.description: Fragment library to search: commercial, natural_products, fda_approved, or all

max_heavy_atoms.description: Maximum number of heavy atoms in fragments (5-50)

similarity_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for similarity searches (0-1)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-1000)

filter_reactive.description: Whether to filter out reactive functional groups

drug_like_only.description: Whether to return only drug-like fragments

price_limit.description: Maximum price per gram for commercial fragments

error_messages: Invalid query structure: Provide a valid SMILES or SMARTS pattern
Invalid search type: Use one of [exact, substructure, similarity, pharmacophore]
Invalid library source: Use one of [commercial, natural_products, fda_approved, all]
Invalid heavy atom count: Must be between 5-50
Invalid similarity threshold: Must be between 0-1
Invalid result limit: Must be between 1-1000
Library search failed: Unable to complete search with given parameters
No results found: Query did not match any fragments in selected library
usage: Specify query structure and search type, then configure library source and filtering criteria. The tool returns matching fragments with relevant metadata.

search_summary.description: Summary of search parameters and results
